item.description:
@x_sam_x1 wrote:

i have made a book its all fine and it works well but i have two problems, the close window button doesnâ€™t work, and i was wondering if the book could load up on log in, as soon as you log in it opens
here is my code for the close window button: case 10162: //Close Window Button c.RemoveAllWindows(); c.page = 2; c.outStream.createFrame(1); c.updateRequired = true;//updates current player status c.appearanceUpdateRequired = true; break;
